timeline.bodyText: Why don't remove old methods? Looks like they will hides potential bugs.
timeline.author: JingsongLi
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -109,11 +109,27 @@ public static DynamicTableSource createTableSource( CatalogTable catalogTable, ReadableConfig configuration, ClassLoader classLoader) { + return createTableSource(catalog, objectIdentifier, catalogTable, configuration, classLoader, false); + } + + /** + * Creates a {@link DynamicTableSource} from a {@link CatalogTable}. + * + *

It considers {@link Catalog#getFactory()} if provided. + */ + public static DynamicTableSource createTableSource(

replies.bodyText: Some tests rely on the old method. But I agree it's better to remove it.
replies.author: lirui-apache

timeline.bodyText:
Not only source, sink too.
I can see the bug in HiveDynamicTableFactory because not remove old method.

It considers {@link Catalog#getFactory()} if provided. + */ + public static DynamicTableSink createTableSink(
